# thunder_ddos_src_based_policy_policy_class_list (Resource)

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform

  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_ddos_src_based_policy_policy_class_list" "thunder_ddos_src_based_policy_policy_class_list" {
  name            = "test"
  class_list_name = "10"
}
```
